member.summary: Returns the secondary tensile area of steel that makes couple with top compressive steel.
member.param: Secondary moment caried by the coupled tensile and compresive areas of steel.
The distance between top compresion fiber and the centroid of compresive area of steel.

member.summary: Returns the area of compressive steel required to resist secondary moment coupling with bottom tensile reinforcement.
member.param: Secondary moment caried by the coupled tensile and compresive areas of steel.
The distance between top compresion fiber and the centroid of compresive area of steel.
Depth of nutral axis.

The default cross-section of the members.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.Design
member.summary: Runs the design of the whole beam.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.CreateShearSections
member.summary: Creates all the necessary shear sections making them ready to be designed.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.MergeAdjacentSections
member.summary: Merges adjacent shear sections with equal design shear so that they may be designed together as one.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.MixPoints(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Mixes all critical shear points in a member to create a sorted array of pair of numbers(coordinate and shear).
member.param: points on the member where the shaer is zero. Measured from the start of the member.
points where the shear is equal to the concrete shear capacity of the member.
Concrete shear capacity of the member assuming the flexure section at the middle of the member.
The shear force at d distance from the face of the left support.
The shear force at d distance form the face of the right support.
The distance from the center of the left support to a point d distance far from the face of the left support.
The distance form the center of the right support to a point, d distance from the face of the right support.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.CreateFlexureSections
member.summary: Creates all the necessary moment sections for the whole beam.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.AssociateSections
member.summary: Bonds negative sections to positive section from which bars extend.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.ReduceNumber
member.summary: Reduces the number of flexure sections to that chosen by the user.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.EliminateSimilar
member.summary: Elliminates similar flexure sections both from the negative and positive flexure sections.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.SortSections
member.summary: Sorts both positive and negative flexure section in increasing order of design moment.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.GetFlexureSectionAt(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the flexure section used to design the moment at a given X_Coordinates coordinate.
member.param: The distance from the left end of the beam.

member.summary: Creates all longitudinal bars for a completed design.

member.summary: Gets or sets the total sections designed with different positive moment.

member.summary: Gets or sets one of the user shearBar choices.

member.summary: Gets or sets second user shearBar choices.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user chosen reinforcement shearBar for stirrup.

member.name: P:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.BasicBar
member.summary: Gets or sets longitudinal shearBar type to be provided at corners to hold stirrups in place.

member.name: P:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.ExposureType
member.summary: Gets or sets the user chosen exposure type of the beam to be used to determine the concrete cover for the reinforcements.

member.name: P:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.ReinfCover
member.summary: Gets or sets the reinforcement cover. It throws exception if the dimension is less than the minimum value required by EBCS for the exposure type of the beam.

member.summary: Gets or sets the relative position of the stirup to the longitudinal shearBar.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum aggregate size of the concrete mix used.

member.summary: Gets or sets the class work of the beam

member.summary: Gets or sets the concrete material used to design the whole beam.

member.name: P:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eDBeam.Steel
member.summary: Gets or sets the steel material used to design the whole beam.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value whether to use two shearBar per section.

member.summary: Gets the collection of longitudinal bars throughout the beam.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ratio the length of tensile bars at supports to the length of that member.

member.name: T:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eImposibleSteelRatioException
member.summary: Exception thrown when the actual steel ratios are one bellow the absolute minimum and one above the absolute maximum steel ratio or when both are above the absolute maximum steel ratio.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eImposibleSteelRatioException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of ESADS_Mechanics.eImposibleSteelRatioException class.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of ESADS_Mechanics.eImposibleSteelRatioException class for specified exception message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The smallest reinforcement ratio that is calculated from mechanics requirment.
The largest reinforcement ratio that is calculated from mechanics requirment.
The largest reinforcement ratio that is provided in the code.

member.name: M:ESADS.Mechanics.Design.Beam.eImposibleSteelRatioException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of ESADS_Mechanics.eImposibleSteelRatioException class with specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of ESADS_Mechanics.eImposibleSteelRatioException class with serialize data.
